definitions.definition: Any bird of a number of genera in the family Phasianidae , notably in the genera Perdix and Alectoris .
examples: On the first day of Christmas, my true love sent to me a partridge in a pear tree.

definitions.definition: The flesh or meat of this bird eaten as food .
A type of cannon charge composed of several missiles fired all together, similar to langrage or case-shot . Also a large cannon that shoots stones.

main_definition: ( ornithology ) Any bird of a number of genera in the family Phasianidae , notably in the genera Perdix and Alectoris .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The flesh or meat of this bird eaten as food .
( obsolete , military ) A type of cannon charge composed of several missiles fired all together, similar to langrage or case-shot . Also a large cannon that shoots stones.
